== Main Inclusion Report for Policykit-KDE ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' Available for all supported architectures. See https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/policykit-kde/
# ''Rationale:''
** Kpackagekit is going to be the default package manager for Jaunty and next Kubuntu releases. Authentication process within Kpackagekit/Packagekit is using Policykit, and policykit-kde is the KDE frontend for it, thus, needed.
0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=policykit-kde|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=policykit-kde|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid, as this is just a frontend for Policykit.
** Any source code review performed? No
** Does not open any port.
0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Good maintenance in Ubuntu.
** Active upstream. See http://websvn.kde.org/trunk/extragear/base/PolicyKit-kde/
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
** Upstream BTS: No upstream bug tracker known.
0. ''UI standards:''
** User-visible strings are internationalized using standard gettext system ? Yes
** Package with translatable strings builds a PO template during package build ? Yes
** End-user applications ship a desktop file ? No, as this works as a kded module.
0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** "Packaging system: cdbs.  No patch system
0. ''Dependencies:''
** kdebase-runtime, kdelibs5, libc6, libdbus-1-3, libgcc1, libglib2.0-0, libpolkit-dbus2, libpolkit-grant2, libpolkit2, libqt4-dbus, libqt4-svg, libqtcore4, libqtgui4, libstdc++6
** All in main.
0. ''Maintenance:''
** Simple and standard KDE packaging.
** Ubuntu Developers are responsible for monitoring the quality of this package.
0. ''Background information: ''
** Upstream calls this software policykit-kde.
0. ''Internationalization: ''
** All the graphical parts of the application are translatable, and use gettext the way KDE does

=== Reviewers ===

MIR bug: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/policykit-kde/+bug/319571]]</nowiki>
